meanings.definition: A stream of water that flows through a mill.
meanings.sent1: The old mill relied on the millstreams to power its machinery.
meanings.sent2: The picturesque countryside was dotted with charming millstreams.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ducks enjoyed splashing around in the millstreams.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like millstreams, constantly moving and changing.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bubbling millstreams was soothing and calming.
